    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_left = x == get_left([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_z_right = z == get_right([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_all_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_all_dark = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_upward_angle = are_above_right([y], [x,z], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_line
            and check_x_left
            and check_z_right
            and check_all_large
            and check_all_dark
            and check_upward_angle
        ):
